verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Now the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8414>formless<s%> and <S%H922>empty.<s%> <S%H2822>Darkness<s%> was on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> was <S%H7363>hovering<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%>" and there was <S%H216>light.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H3588>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> divided the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H996>from<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H3117>"day,<s%>" and the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3915>"night.<s%>" There was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let there be an <S%H7549>expanse<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and let it <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse,<s%> and <S%H914>divided<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse;<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> <S%H8064>"sky.<s%>" There was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> under the <S%H8064>sky<s%> be gathered <S%H6960>together<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and let the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land <S%H7200>appear;<s%>" and it was so.

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> "earth," and the gathering <S%H4723>together<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3220>"seas.<s%>" <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1876>yield<s%> <S%H1877>grass,<s%> <S%H6212>herbs<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H6213>bearing<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H834>with<s%> its <S%H2233>seed<s%> in <S%H776>it,<s%> on the earth;" and it was so.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>yielded<s%> <S%H1877>grass,<s%> <S%H6212>herbs<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H6213>bearing<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> with its <S%H2233>seed<s%> in <S%H4327>it,<s%> after their kind; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>
There was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let there be <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of <S%H8064>sky<s%> to <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3915>night;<s%> and let them be for <S%H226>signs,<s%> and for <S%H4150>seasons,<s%> and for <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H8141>years;<s%>
and let them be for <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of <S%H8064>sky<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> on the <S%H776>earth;<s%>" and it was so.

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3974>lights:<s%> the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> the <S%H3915>night.<s%> He also made the <S%H3556>stars.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> them in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of <S%H8064>sky<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

and to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over the <S%H3117>day<s%> and over the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and to <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>
There was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5315>swarm<s%> with <S%H8317>swarms<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H8318>creatures,<s%> and let <S%H5775>birds<s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of <S%H8064>sky.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H1419>large<s%> sea <S%H8577>creatures,<s%> and every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moves,<s%> with which the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8317>swarmed,<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and every <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "Be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and let <S%H5775>birds<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
There was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>produce<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creatures<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H929>livestock,<s%> creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> and <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind;<s%>" and it was so.

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H929>livestock<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and everything that <S%H7431>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in our <S%H6754>image,<s%> after our <S%H1823>likeness:<s%> and let them have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and over the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and over the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and over all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and over every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in his own <S%H6754>image.<s%> In <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H6754>image<s%> he <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H2145>him;<s%> male and <S%H5347>female<s%> he created <S%H1254>them.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H430>them.<s%> God <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6509>them,<s%> "Be fruitful, <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and subdue <S%H3533>it.<s%> Have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> over the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and over every living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you every <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> which is on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and every <S%H6086>tree,<s%> which bears <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed.<s%> It will <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H402>food.<s%>

To every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and to every <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to everything that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> in which there is <S%H2416>life,<s%> I have given every <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> for <S%H402>food;<s%>" and it was so.

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> everything <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H3966>and,<s%> behold, it was very <S%H2896>good.<s%> There was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
